body.description: Dashboard monitoring the Service Level of the Sales department in the Business Unit 1
body.title: BU-1 Sales Dashboard

definition.name: Queue KPIs - v1
definition.description: The ability to view a representation of all the agents assigned to a group and their current states provides supervisors a quick look at available staff and an at-a-glance view of their current states.

column.description: A ratio of calls answered to distinct calls entered queue or route point.
column.label: SL

column.description: A ratio of calls answered within 10 seconds to distinct calls entered queue or route point.
column.label: SL (10s)

column.description: A ratio of calls answered within 20 seconds to distinct calls entered queue or route point.
column.label: SL (20s)

column.description: A ratio of calls answered within 30 seconds to distinct calls entered queue or route point.
column.label: SL (30s)

column.description: A ratio of calls answered within 45 seconds to distinct calls entered queue or route point.
column.label: SL (45s)

column.description: A ratio of calls answered within 60 seconds to distinct calls entered queue or route point.
column.label: SL (60s)

column.description: The total number of first entries of voice interactions on a specified queue or at a specified route point. Because the DistinguishByConnID option is turned on, Stat Server counts each call only once, even if an interaction entered a specified queue or route point or group of queues more than one time.
column.label: Distinct Entered

column.description: The total number of calls entered on a specified queue or at a specified route point. Typically, you might have several calls entering in the same queue for one single voice interaction to change target after a specific timeout.
column.label: Entered

text: Result = Data.Abandoned.Value + Data.Abandoned_From_Ringing.Value + Data.Answered.Value + Data.Cleared.Value + Data.Current_Calls.Value;

column.description: The total number of virtual or live voice interactions abandoned on a specified queue or route point when a caller hangs up while waiting on that queue or at that route point or if the customer line is dropped for any reason. This metric does not include the voice interactions abandoned while ringing.
column.label: Abandoned

column.description: The total number of virtual or live voice interactions abandoned while an agent desktop is ringing when the customer line is dropped for any reason.
column.label: Abandoned Ringing

column.description: The total number of voice interactions that were cleared from this virtual queue. The concept of cleared calls applies to routing strategies where an interaction may wait in a virtual queue for one of several targets to become available. When a target does become available, the call is distributed to that target and is 'cleared' from other targets.
column.label: Cleared

column.description: The total number of virtual or live voice interactions distributed from a queue or route point directly to an agent and answered by an agent.
column.label: Answered

column.description: The total number of virtual or live voice interactions distributed from a queue or route point directly to an agent and answered by an agent in less than 10 seconds.
column.label: Ans < 10s

column.description: The total number of virtual or live voice interactions distributed from a queue or route point directly to an agent and answered by an agent between 10 and 20 seconds.
column.label: Ans. 10 and 20s

column.description: The total number of virtual or live voice interactions distributed from a queue or route point directly to an agent and answered by an agent in less than 30 seconds.
column.label: Ans. < 30s

column.description: The total number of virtual or live voice interactions distributed from a queue or route point directly to an agent and answered by an agent in less than 60 seconds.
column.label: Ans. < 60s

column.description: The total number of live (current) or virtual voice interactions currently waiting at a distribution DN, typically a VQ.
column.label: Current

column.description: The average time of live calls currently waiting at a distribution DN, typically a VQ.
column.label: Current AWT

column.description: The maximum number of voice interactions simultaneously waiting in this queue for the day.
column.label: Max Calls

column.description: The minimum number of voice interactions simultaneously waiting in this queue during the last hour.
column.label: Min Calls

column.description: The total number of live, voice interactions that were distributed from a distribution DN to an agent and then transferred to another destination by redirection or forwarding.
column.label: Forwarded

column.description: The maximum waiting time for live or virtual voice interactions currently on a queue or at a route point.
column.label: Oldest Call Waiting

column.description: The maximum time that live or virtual voice interactions waited in a queue or at a route point before being answered by this agent.
column.label: Max Answer Time

column.description: The average amount of time a voice call waits on a specified queue or at a specified route point before the interaction is answered.
column.label: ASA

column.description: The average amount of time spent handling an Interaction distributed directly from this mediation DN.
column.label: AHT

column.description: The average amount of time a voice call waits on a specified queue or at a specified route point before the interaction is abandoned.
column.label: AWA

column.description: The average amount of time an interaction waits on a specified queue or at a specified route point.
column.label: AWT

column.description: Percentage of calls that entered this queue or route point and were abandoned while in queue or while ringing on agent's DN. (it includes all calls entered in the queue).
column.label: % Abandoned

text: if (Data.Entered.Value > 0) Result = 100 * Data.Abandoned.Value / Data.Entered.Value; else Result = 0;

column.description: Percentage of calls that entered this queue or route point and were cleared. (it includes all calls entered in the queue).
column.label: % Cleared

text: if (Data.Entered.Value > 0) Result = 100 * Data.Cleared.Value / Data.Entered.Value; else Result = 0;

column.description: The total time calls waited in the queue.
column.label: Wait Time

column.description: The number of agents that are currently logged into a given queue.
column.label: Agents Logged In

column.description: The number of agents who are currently in the ready state and are logged in to the specified queue.
column.label: Agents Ready

column.description: The number of agents who are in the ready state versus the agents who are currently logged in to the specified queue.
column.label: % Agents Ready

column.description: The number of agents that are currently logged in at all the DNs within a specified agent group, or at all the DNs at places within the specified place group.
column.label: Logged In

column.description: The number of agents who are currently in the Ready state. Typically, it represents the total number of agents waiting for customer interactions or specific tasks.
column.label: Ready

column.description: The number of agents who are currently logged in and who are currently in the NotReady state. Typically, it represents the total number of agents not available to handle incoming interactions.
column.label: Not Ready

column.description: The number of agents who are in Not Ready state with Reason Break.
column.label: Break

column.description: The number of agents who are in Not Ready state with Reason Lunch.
column.label: Lunch

column.description: The number of agents who are in Not Ready state with Reason different from Lunch and Break.
column.label: Offline

column.description: The current number of agents in the AfterCallWork status. Typically this status happens when an agent is no longer talking with the customer but still requires additional time to handle properly customer requests.
column.label: ACW

column.description: The current number of agents in CallConsult status (participating in consultation calls).
column.label: Consult

column.description: The current number of agents in CallDialing status (dialing calls).
column.label: Dialing

column.description: The current number of agents in CallOnHold status; that is, where the agent has one or more calls on hold.
column.label: On Hold

column.description: The current number of agents in CallInbound status; that is, where the agent is conducting one or more inbound calls.
column.label: Inbound

column.description: The current number of agents in CallOutbound status; that is, where the agent is conducting one or more outbound calls.
column.label: Outbound

column.description: The current number of agents in CallInternal status; that is, where the agent is conducting one or more internal calls.
column.label: Internal

column.description: The current number of agents in CallRinging status; that is, where one or more calls are waiting to be answered by an agent.
column.label: Ringing

column.description: The number of agents that are currently logged out from Genesys environment.
column.label: Logged Out

column.description: The percentage of agents ready to handle customers calls.
column.label: % Ready

column.description: The percentage of agents in a not ready status.
column.label: % Not Ready

column.description: The percentage of agents handling customer calls.
column.label: % Inbound

column.description: Total number of agents currently working
column.label: Working

text: Result=Data.Current_Agents_Consult.Value + Data.Current_Agents_Dialing.Value + Data.Current_Agents_On_Hold.Value + Data.Current_Agents_Inbound.Value + Data.Current_Agents_Outbound.Value + Data.Current_Agents_Internal.Value + Data.Current_Agents_Ringing.Value;
